4. Press **MENU/OK** when prompted.

!Select Comm Setting

5. Select **WIRED LAN**.

!Wired LAN Selection

6. Select **CREATE NEW** to create a new communication setting profile.

> üí° **Tip:**  
> You can also select or edit existing profiles.

!Create New Profile

7. Adjust **IP ADDRESS SETTING**.
   - Select **AUTO** to use an IP address assigned by the network.
   - Select **MANUAL** to choose the IP address manually as described in ‚ÄúConnecting Using an IP Address‚Äù (üìñ 265).

!IP Address Setting

8. Select **NEXT** to proceed after adjusting IP address settings.

!Next Step
